channel.title: Press Releases - Hetzner Online GmbH
channel.description: Our press center contains the latest information about our products and the company Hetzner Online.

item.title: Hetzner Data Center Park Helsinki has expanded with a new data center
item.content:encoded:
• Tuusula, Finland – 08. November 2021

    Hetzner Data Center Park Helsinki has expanded with a new data center

    Hetzner Data Center Park Helsinki in southern Tuusula - recently expanded to include another new data center, which was put into operation in July 2021.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner Goes USA! – Hetzner opens new location in USA
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 03. November 2021

    Hetzner Goes USA! – Hetzner opens new location in USA

    Hetzner Cloud now also has servers in Ashburn, Virgina, their first location outside of Europe. This means that in addition to Nuremberg, Falkenstein and Helsinki, customers can now also choose...

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner wins platinum in the category cloud server
item.content:encoded:
• Frankfurt am Main/Gunzenhausen, Germany – 02. September 2021

    Hetzner wins platinum in the category cloud server

    Hetzner Online once again earned the top place on the winners' podium this year in the "Cloud Server" category and took home the "Platinum" prize.

    Show more

item.title: Setup special at Hetzner in September
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 01. September 2021

    Setup special at Hetzner in September

    This September, Hetzner Online has slashed prices for several of their dedicated root servers.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner now offering AMD EPYC™ 7003 Series processor powered cloud servers
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 31. March 2021

    Hetzner now offering AMD EPYC™ 7003 Series processor powered cloud servers

    Hetzner Online is now offering six new models of dedicated vCPU cloud servers which are equipped with the newest AMD EPYC™ Series processor.

    Show more

item.title: Data Center Park Helsinki is expanding
item.content:encoded:
• Helsinki, Finland – 06. October 2020

    Data Center Park Helsinki is expanding

    Hetzner's Data Center Park in southern Tuusula will expand again with a new data center at the end of 2020.

    Show more

item.title: Platinum for Hetzner Online at the Service Provider Awards 2020
item.content:encoded:
• Frankfurt am Main/Gunzenhausen, Germany – 02. September 2020

    Platinum for Hetzner Online at the Service Provider Awards 2020

    Hetzner Online achieved 1st place at the Service Provider Awards in the category Cloud Server.

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner introduces Load Balancers to its Cloud platform
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 22. June 2020

    Hetzner introduces Load Balancers to its Cloud platform

    Today, Hetzner expanded the product set of its Cloud platform to include Load Balancers. Curious customers can join the free beta-test for Load Balancers and experiment with how they improve...

    Show more

item.title: Corona crisis: Hetzner Online supports self-help contact organization "Kiss Mittelfranken" with up to 100 Storage Share instances
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 15. April 2020

    Corona crisis: Hetzner Online supports self-help contact organization "Kiss Mittelfranken" with up to 100 Storage Share instances

    The self-help contact organization "Kiss Mittelfranken" has created a platform for digital communication called Kiss.On. (In German, "Kiss" is short for "contact information for self-help"; the group operates in Central...

    Show more

item.title: Hetzner Online launches new Ryzen based dedicated root servers
item.content:encoded:
• Gunzenhausen, Germany – 29. October 2019

    Hetzner Online launches new Ryzen based dedicated root servers

    The web hosting company and data center operator Hetzner has expanded its line of servers with AMD's third generation of Ryzen CPUs.

    Show more
